wikipedia_page.main: Luke Donnelly (born 20 January 1996) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a striker for Arbroath. Donnelly began his career as a youth player for Celtic and had loan spells at East Stirlingshire, Alloa Athletic and Greenock Morton. He then played for Queen's Park and Stranraer.

response: Morton signed a third player on loan from Celtic; long-time target, forward Luke Donnelly.
